siteMetadata.title: /dev/null
siteMetadata.description: Personal blog, which mainly contains tutorial on how to perform specific development tasks

node.excerpt: There are different ways to add a comments section to your blog, in this guide we will focus on how to use Disqus to enable users to leave comments on a blog generated with GatsbyJS.

frontmatter.title: Add Disqus comments to a GatsbyJS static blog

node.excerpt: Sometimes it happens that after installing different versions of Java you want to remove the old/unused ones In this brief tutorial we'll see how to remove old versions of Java from macOS.

frontmatter.title: Uninstall older versions of Java from macOS

node.excerpt: In this guide I will show you how to use a different SSH key for each domain.

frontmatter.title: How to use different SSH keys

node.excerpt: DataDog is a monitoring service for cloud-scale applications, in the following guide we'll see how to create a docker container with the DataDog agent and how to use it to publish custom metrics.

frontmatter.title: Install DataDog Agent as a docker container

node.excerpt:
In this guide I will show you how to use gRPC to write a simple client (in C++) and server (in Go) for your service.

For this tutorial we will use the code available in the following Github project:Â pasdam/grpcExample.

For the client, in this article I'll show how to write a command line one, but in the repository there is also a GUI client written with the Qt framework.

frontmatter.title: Use gRPC/protobuf with C++ and Go
